publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1282 Bill Kidd: Morning Star Relaunchâ€”That the Parliament welcomes and supports the relaunch, on 3 March 2008, of the Morning Star as a daily newspaper in Scotland and as a major contribution to the plurality and balance of the Scottish press. Supported by: Bob Doris*
S3M-1282 Morning Star Relaunch (lodged on 1 February 2008) Cathy Peattie*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-1282 Morning Star Relaunch (lodged on 1 February 2008) Christine Grahame*
S3M-1282 Morning Star Relaunch (lodged on 1 February 2008) Marlyn Glen*
